subject: Re: mirrors inactive: debian.teleglobe.net, ftp.lug.udel.edu
body:
On Fri, Apr 27, 2007 at 08:53:43PM +0200, Simon Paillard wrote:
> I will remove old outdated mirrors from packages.d.o.
> Frank, do you plan packages.d.o to dynamically use Mirrors.masterlist ?

I don't think this is possible, because we don't have machine-parseable
metrics to select which of the 35-odd American mirrors to show.

What we could do is have download.pl feed off a file in CVS, but a separate,
manually-generated one; or from a new tag in the masterlist.

> > * http://debian.teleglobe.net
> 
> I've sent emails to its admins (CC of this mail) several times, without
> success.
> Note that this mirror has been removed from the list of mirrors since
> Sun Dec 3 18:07:41 2006 UTC.
> 
> > * http://ftp.lug.udel.edu
> 
> Same here, the mirror is no longer in the list.

I'd be removing them from the live copy of download.pl now, but I can't log
into puccini.d.o, which is where packages.d.o currently points.
I'm a member of the debwww group, this should be possible...?

-- 
     2. That which causes joy or happiness.


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-mirrors-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
